name: SleepHack
0:
”Alexa, ask sleep hack to hack my sleep”
”Improve my sleep”
”Give me a sleep hack”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep hack
des: Do you ever find that you have trouble getting to sleep, or find that you wake up in the morning feeling tired and lethargic? This skill has helpful advice to improve your sleep. With hacks on how to get to sleep more easily, have a more restful sleep, and how to wake up feeling ready for the day ahead, this is a great skill for anyone who sleeps!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
